types.name: 特性:    新增功能 | A new feature
修复:    修复缺陷 | A bug fix
文档:    文档更新 | Documentation only changes
格式:    代码格式 | Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code
重构:    代码重构| A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
性能:    性能提升 | A code change that improves performance
测试:    测试相关 | Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
工具:    构建流程、外部依赖变更 | Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies
集成:    持续集成| Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts
回滚:    代码回退 | Revert to a commit
其他:    对构建过程或辅助工具和库的更改（不影响源文件、测试用例） | Other changes that do not modify src or test files
